About the game: 1000$ – a first-person horror where you are supposed to rob a house. The main character is a young guy who decides to upgrade his computer due to the release of some new interesting games. However, he has to get 1,000 dollars somewhere to buy the required hardware. So he decides to rob a house where an old lady lives. But what he doesn’t know yet is that the lady always has a gun with her and doesn’t sleep at night.
